channel.title: Jail command
channel.description: how do you make a jail command for a rsps 317

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Mushy13, post:2, topic:405419”]try putting this in you’re client.java file

[sub]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“jail”) && c.playerRights >= 2 && c.playerRights != 5) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players [i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.teleportToX = 2606;
c2.teleportToY = 3358;
c2.teleBlockDelay = 30000;
c2.sendMessage(“You have been jailed by “+c.playerName+” for 30 minutes.”);
c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed “+c2.playerName+”. "+c.playerName+“be released in 30 minutes.”);
} [/sub][/quote]
Commands.java* ++ that’s for PI.

Read full topic

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

try putting this in you’re client.java file

[sub]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“jail”) && c.playerRights >= 2 && c.playerRights != 5) {
try {
String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players [i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.teleportToX = 2606;
c2.teleportToY = 3358;
c2.teleBlockDelay = 30000;
c2.sendMessage(“You have been jailed by “+c.playerName+” for 30 minutes.”);
c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed “+c2.playerName+”. "+c.playerName+“be released in 30 minutes.”);
} [/sub]
